overview:
Matt graduated in 2008 from University of North Carolina at Charlotte with separate degrees in Electrical Engineering and Physics. Post academia, Matt began his career at United Protective Technologies where he lead development in producing exotic forms of nano-composite diamond for wear and friction reduction applications. He received a greenbelt in lean six sigma through North Carolina State University in 2011. In September of 2011 Matt moved overseas to Germany, where he began development of DropWall with Co-Founder Christian Strang. Matt returned to USA in July of 2012.

Currently, Matt is CEO / Co-founder at DropWall.com a new social discovery site aimed towards disrupting social networking in Universities. Additionally, Matt is working on another startup project attempting to disrupt the home security market.

Matt provides the leadership and vision behind the team in DropWall. With much experience in the product development in the high-tech market, Matt provides a solid foundation coordinating the product development and business aspects of DropWall.
